participant_2.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I'll do it for my best friend.
I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I love them and I try to make time for them whenever I can.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.

content.text: Hey! I am doing well. How about you?
I am doing great! I live in Portland, Oregon. Where are you from?
I am from the great white north! I am excited to move to a new city and meet new people.
What are you excited about for college?
I am excited to meet new people and start a new chapter in my life. I am also excited to join a dance team.
That's awesome! I am not a morning person, but I would do it for my best friend.
I am not a morning person either, but I will try to make it work. I am excited to meet you!
Me too! I am sure we will be great friends.
